openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        '200':
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Success"
      callbacks:
        myEvent:
          "$ref": "#/components/callbacks/inProgress"
components:
  callbacks:
    onProgress:
      "{$request.body#/onProgressUrl}":
        delete:
          responses:
            '204':
              description: Deleted
